__e: He's been trying to get us killed ever since we landed at Omaha Beach.
- I've tried to make it work, really I have, but -
I have been trying to bring one over for months now, but the wretched creatures keep dying on the way here.
No, not much aside from the fact that someone's tried to take my life a couple of times.
But I never put out ant poisoning and I never deliberately tried to kill them.
A lot of people have tried to kill me, and I'm still here.
But still, since you returned to the city, you've made no effort to see me.
I worry that my son might not understand what I've tried to be.
What you don't know, and, as far as I can tell, haven't bothered in the least to discover is who they are. Right?
- Don't you think we tried everything before summoning you?
Believe me, Charles, I've lobbied on your behalf.
You've had your camera work, your powder on the floor, and it's just gotten worse, OK?
We've tried everything, but not one clue,
I know you've tried so hard, but perhaps it was too soon?
Really, I did, but... I'm just not him.
